title: travis: 3rdparty_analysis_workflow failing on git-annex devel run
body:
As mentioned in gh-3856, the 3rdparty_analysis_workflow script is failing in the git-annex devel cron runs:

```
create(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis (dataset)
[INFO   ] Cloning https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git [1 other candidates] into '/tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural'
[ERROR  ] Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were: (OrderedDict([('https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git', "Cmd('/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git') failed due to: exit code(128)\n  cmdline: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git clone --progress -v https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural [cmd.py:wait:414]"), ('https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git/.git', "Cmd('/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git') failed due to: exit code(128)\n  cmdline: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git clone --progress -v https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git/.git /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural [cmd.py:wait:414]")]),) [install(/tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural)]
install(error): src/forrest_structural (dataset) [Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were: (OrderedDict([('https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git', "Cmd('/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git') failed due to: exit code(128)\n  cmdline: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git clone --progress -v https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural [cmd.py:wait:414]"), ('https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git/.git', "Cmd('/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git') failed due to: exit code(128)\n  cmdline: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git clone --progress -v https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git/.git /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.dI7B/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural [cmd.py:wait:414]")]),)]
I: done running docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh: failed
travis_time:end:246f3aa0:start=1572982620618127711,finish=1572982622890274030,duration=2272146319,event=scriptThe command "if [ ${DATALAD_TESTS_SSH:-0} != 1 -o -n "${BUILD_DATALAD_EXTENSION:-}" ] || echo "${TMPDIR:-}" | grep -q ' '; then echo "Testing examples is disabled by configuration"; else $NOSE_WRAPPER ../tools/testing/run_doc_examples; fi" exited with 1.
```

This occurred on both the [0.11x][0] and [master][1] cron runs.

I'm not able to trigger it locally with the latest annex release (7.20191024) or with an annex built from the same commit (7b13db551d) as neurodebian's devel build.

```
$ git annex version --raw
7.20191024
$ datalad --version
datalad 0.12.0rc6.dev90

$ sh ~/src/python/datalad/docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.36IH/myanalysis
create(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.36IH/myanalysis (dataset)
[INFO   ] Cloning https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git [1 other candidates] into '/tmp/datalad_demo_bob.36IH/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural'
[INFO   ]   Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
install(ok): src/forrest_structural (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  install (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
[submodule "src/forrest_structural"]
        path = src/forrest_structural
.                        [annex]  master  ✗ 2019-11-06/15:18:24  ✓  0 Bytes/0 Bytes
src/forrest_structural   [annex]  master  ✗ 2016-02-12/08:41:48  ✓  0 Bytes/2.6 GB
^CERROR:
Interrupted by user while doing magic: KeyboardInterrupt() [cmd.py:_process_one_line:354]
```

[0]: https://travis-ci.org/datalad/datalad/jobs/607771473#L1295
[1]: https://travis-ci.org/datalad/datalad/jobs/606137796#L1299
